name: Tandberg SLR40 Drive Kit SCSI intern
description:
20/40 GB, Transferrate max. 4 MB/s.,
inkl. internes SCSI Kabel mit Terminator,
Media Cartridge, Cleaning Cartridge,
Treiber für SUN Solaris, AIX, SCO-Unix, UnixWare, UNIX, HP-UX, Linux Supported in Operating System, Mac, Windows98, NT Workstation, 3 Jahre Herstellergarantie
